framework:entity-query.name: mapSaleContractTemplateList
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select contract from ContractTemplate contract where contract.type = 'MAP_SELL' and contract.projectCode = '#{logonInfo.groupCode}'

framework:entity-query.name: saleNewContractTemplateList
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select contract from ContractTemplate contract where contract.type = 'NOW_SELL' and contract.projectCode = '#{logonInfo.groupCode}'

framework:entity-query.name: topNews
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select article from Article article where article.category.type = 'News'

framework:entity-query.name: topEvents
framework:entity-query.ejbql: select article from Article article where article.category.type = 'Events'
